name: Tanker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack
display_help: Kinetic Melee features a mix of fast light attacks and slow heavy attacks, including some with range. All attacks in this set reduce the damage strength of enemies who are hit.

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Quick_Strike
powers.display_help: Frozen Fists encrusts your hands in ice, giving them the ability to quickly inflict minor damage on villains. The foe's attack and movement speed is Slowed, due to the chills caused by the cold blows. This power can bruise an enemy, making them more vulnerable to damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 25.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
25.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
-7.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage for 4s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Body_Blow
powers.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Quick Strike. Body Blow is capable of stunning an opponent occasionally. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 20.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 7.15s on target
20.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 2s on target
-7.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage for 5s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Smashing_Blow
powers.display_help: Smashing Blow is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a good amount of damage. Has a greater chance to stun than body blow. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 33.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 7.15s on target
33.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 2s on target
-7.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage for 5s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -100.00% strength to range for 20s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Repulsing_Torrent
powers.display_help: Repulsing Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 45° arc (16 targets max)

display_info: 80.00% chance for 7.8 magnitude knock on target
80.00% chance for 7.8 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Power_Siphon
powers.display_help: Power Siphon adds a small bonus to hit and modifies your other Kinetic Attack powers, so they are now capable of draining the strength of your enemies and adding that strength to you. This effect will stack up to 5 times. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Burst
powers.display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be knocked down as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockdown

display_info: 50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Focused_Burst
powers.display_help: Projects a burst of focused power over a short distance. Focused Burst deals high damage and can possibly knock down your foe. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Kinetic_Attack.Total_Focus
powers.display_help: Concentrated Strike is a slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Concentrated Strike, its recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 11.92s on target
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 2s on target
-7.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage for 8s on target
